org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowContextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContext
      • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContextWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowApplication, ShadowContextThemeWrapper, ShadowService

    @Implements(value=android.content.ContextWrapper.class)
public class ShadowContextWrapper
extends ShadowContext
    Shadow for ContextWrapper.
